title: Rp card :/ Help
body: So.. My brother bought a RP Card in Germany which we don't have in Serbia, and I've tried activating it and it says ''Try again in a couple of minutes'' and I did, so I waited even longer and same thing popped up. There is this little thing in that box too it says ''If you see this multiple times contact support'' so I did contact support. Still waiting for respond tho. Money is a very big deal right now and I don't want to tell my brother he threw 10$ away, so I'm coming here to look for some help. If any Riot employee can look into this and kinda try and help me

replies.body:
Hi there ive has the same problem .
First wut country did u set in ur payment ?
if ur in serbia u might wanna put germany cuz this is where ur brother bought it ?
And u need an activation of the merchant to redeem it aswell .

if that didnt work then sorry mate :(

If this issue is still happening, we'd like to help!  Have the account owner send us a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can take a look and see what's causing this error.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
